resources.string: Welcome to Cozii Proptech.\nSmart property manager in\nreal time.
Connect with landlord, request\nand track maintenance request
Receive and monitor repairs, receive\npayments, advertise your properties
Reach more customers, get new work\norders and increase your income
you can request repairs\nfrom the landlord with cozii.
you can book a handyman\nor service expert with cozii.
you can pay rent and\nutilities with cozii.
We ask every tenant for a\nfew details before enjoy\nthe new lifestyle.
